header.profession: Technical Leader | AWS | Solutions Architect Pro | Security | Serverless

intro.description: Systems Engineer from Piloto de Colombia University I have Teamwork Skills with a High Degree of responsibility and commitment to the assigned tasks. Great ability to learn and adapt to the Teamwork. I have Certified experience with Analysis and Design DataBase for Sql Server, Oracle, MySQL and PostgreSQL including procedural programming (PL / SQL). Experience in C#, Java and Python programming. Development experience with frameworks like Angular 10, Ionic 5 and Spring. Knowledge of PHP. Experience with tools to manage work teams such as Mantis Bug Tracker, Redmine, Jira and Clockify. Experience with version control systems such as GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, and Subversion. DevOps experience with Spring Boot, Docker and Docker Compose.
